import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' const Products = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getProducts = async () => { try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3001/products'); if(response.status == true) setProducts(await response.json()); } catch (error) { console.log('Get products error: ', error.message); } } }) return ( < div className="container-fluid" >
{/* */}
